header.title: The cdv program

comref.comsummary: Script used for starting the Crashdump Viewer from the OS command line.

description.p: The cdv shell script can be found under the priv directory of the observer application. The script is used for starting the Crashdump Viewer tool from the OS command line.
For Windows users, cdv.bat can be found in the same location.

func.name: cdv [file]
func.fsummary: Start the Crashdump Viewer and load the given file.

desc.p: The file arguments is optional. If not given, a file dialog will pop up allowing the user to select a crashdump from the file system.
